version_description: New combat system. Now you can choose the direction of the attack and strike on the move. New controls for siege weapons. Now you can control catapults and ballistas. Also, in order for the siege weapon to move, it is necessary to push it. Added online battles. You can fight in the field, village, castle and city. There are several game mods for online battles. Improved combat voice acting. Replaced all troops except the elite in Europe, Russia, Norway and the Delhi Sultanate. All Roman troops and uniforms were replaced by Byzantine ones. Added a new soldier to the branch. Added new bandits like European Bandits, Northern Bandits and Desert Bandits. Bandits are divided into areas of habitation, some of them are found only in certain areas. Added 142 suits, 120 helmets and 55 pairs of shoes. Fixed bugs.
